name: 重生之绝地-突突突(Rebirth-Land of Zombies)
name_original: 重生之绝地-突突突(Rebirth-Land of Zombies)
description:
Game introduction:


This is a first-person zombie game with no plot
Players need to complete the task of killing all zombies
Weapons are guns, knives, grenades, crossbows
4 spawn points randomly one birthplace.

3A level picture experience, very real picture effect
The game goes online and is discounted immediately, and the first release is only $1
